modName: SkymodRace BetaV1.0 -New Race and Fallower- Vex and Adrianne Avenicci
descriptionHtml:
****SKYMODTESTRACE and FALLOWER****
    ** VEX and  FALLOWER ADRIANNE AVENICCI**

Was prepared with Creation kit
************************************************
   Contents
         *************************
-Skymod Race Beta V1.0
One female character 
Name Vex
One pieces follower
-Name: Adrianne Avenicci 
UNP female body and head files
 One  Hairstyle files 
******************************************************
This mod is two versions
Nude and normal
*******************************************************
Required files
Skyrim update 13
*******************************************************
  Explanation
*****************************

These characters are copies of the original characters in the game
Vex character is not 100% identical
Because of different races with the reason for the restriction on copying and Creation kit
is not possible.
At least I can not at the moment.
But it maybe possible in a future time.
---------------------------------------
Vex character is Imperial race.
So if you want to get 100% identical
 the following modes
 should be available on your computer.
----------
Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)
http://skse.silverlock.org/
---------
Race menu
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?
----------
CharGen Morphs
Note:Requires CharGen Core
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36925/?
--------------------------------------
If you want to play with real character of Imperial Vex
" press and ,then press enter
Write to the console
showracemenu
Select imperial race
and preset slot must be 0
Then
press F9
so much
You are playing with real Vex
Our followers are waiting for you.
***********************************
location follower: Whiterun Warmaidens
İron woman  :) Adrianne Avenicci 
***********************************
Setup options
**************************
Faster safe
Nexus Mod Manager

Manuel:
extract to  all the files ,in the Skyrim  data folder

uninstall 
data\meshes\skymod
-delete skymod folder
data\textures\skymod
-delete skymod folder
data:\skymodtest.esp
-delete skymodtest.esp
**************************************************************
Bugs
***************************
if, strange lights over lines of characters, see the shadows?
To download the following mode
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29791/?
Try the versions of the UNP option.
Extract the files from the zip
/
femalebody_1_sk.dds
femalehands_1_sk.dds
femalehead_sk.dds
/
Copy files
Follow the road
The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim \ Data \ textures \ skymod: \
paste files
that's it.

Another may be many errors.
for example
Different versions of the game
missing files
update errors
Crack version setup
mode conflict
too many mods setup
low graphics cards pc components
and similar errors.
----------------------------------------
 I would recommend for images in photo;
---------------------------------------
Sombor Dreams ENB build
Or
First Seed ENB 
The Wilds ENB Collection-21123-Final
The Grim and Somber ENBS
---------------------------------------

special thanks
Dimon99

Big thank
Bethesda Softworks

And thank you Nexusmods

Sorry for my English.

Have a good time
...
author: skyser
